me.lucko.helper.terminable

Interface Terminable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChannelAgent<T>, Events.Handler<T>, Events.MergedHandler<T>, Hologram, Scheduler.Task, TerminableRegistry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceCallback, SimpleTerminableRegistry
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Terminable
    Represents an object that can be unregistered, stopped, or gracefully halted.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Terminable EMPTY 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void bindWith(TerminableConsumer consumer)
      Registers this terminable with a terminable consumer (usually the plugin instance)
      default boolean hasTerminated()
      Used to help cleanup held terminable instances in registries
      static Terminable of(Runnable r) 
      boolean terminate()
      Terminate this instance

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY

        static final Terminable EMPTY

    • Method Detail

      • of

        @Nonnull
static Terminable of(@Nonnull
                               Runnable r)

      • terminate

        boolean terminate()
        Terminate this instance
        Returns:
        true if the termination was successful

      • bindWith

        default void bindWith(@Nonnull
                      TerminableConsumer consumer)
        Registers this terminable with a terminable consumer (usually the plugin instance)
        Parameters:
        consumer - the terminable consumer

      • hasTerminated

        default boolean hasTerminated()
        Used to help cleanup held terminable instances in registries
        Returns:
        true if this terminable has been terminated already
